attributes.action: the police duty of care should be for the victim first, and the criminal second
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
example
a criminal steals from a person and escapes on a motorcycle and is not waring a helmet, in this instance the police would not give chase, in case the criminal was injured in the chase and claimed compensation. thus the duty of care to the victim has come second to the duty of care of the criminal.
The police should be able to give chase, and the criminal loose any right to prosecute the police, or claim compensation for any injuries, because the criminal instigated the events.
Also there should be an automatic charge of causing danger to the police and the public which should come with an automatic sentance, similar to the American system of Felany Evasion.
